title: The new weapon against demons - cellphones
text:
The new weapon against demons - cellphones Tuesday, April 17, 2018 - 01:27 
At an exorcism course in Rome on Monday, one cardinal revealed he has been casting out demons over the phone. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
At an exorcism course in Rome on Monday, one cardinal revealed he has been casting out demons over the phone. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qGWRbW
